item: [B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR white] DEPORTES TU MARCADOR CORTESIA TORETE[COLOR lime][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B][/COLOR] $doregex[yaestaarreglada] F4mProxytengo #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re, requests headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; rv:72.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/72.0', 'Referer': 'https://dailysport.pw/c1.php', 'Accept' : 'application/json, text/plain, */*', 'Accept-Language' : 'es-ES,es;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3'} a = requests.get("https://dailysport.pw/login", headers=headers, verify=False) return a.cookies F4mProxytengo2 =(.*?)for $doregex[F4mProxytengo] &cookie=auth=$doregex[paginas] yaestaarreglada [B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR white][yaestaarreglada.param1] - [COLOR gold][yaestaarreglada.param2][COLOR aqua][yaestaarreglada.param5][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B][/COLOR] https://i.imgur.com/Vq1pYBs.jpg https://i.imgur.com/py1aH72.jpg $doregex[get-decode]|user-agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; rv:73.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/73.0&referer=https://dailysport.pw/c1.php&cookie=auth=$doregex[paginas] #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re, requests r = requests.get("https://dailysport.pw/", verify=False) contenido = r.text return re.findall('(?s)(\d.*?)<.*?>.*?([A-Z].*?)|d>(.*?)<', contenido) paginas #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('[B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR lightsalmon]elige servidor[/COLOR][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B]', ['[B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR aqua]server 1[/COLOR][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B]', '[B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR aquamarine]server 2[/COLOR][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B]', '[B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR aquamarine]server 3[/COLOR][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B]', '[B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR aquamarine]server 4[/COLOR][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B]', '[B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR aquamarine]server 5[/COLOR][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B]', '[B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR aquamarine]server 6[/COLOR][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B]', '[B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR aquamarine]server 7[/COLOR][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B]', '[B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR aquamarine]server 8[/COLOR][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B]', '[B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR aquamarine]server 9[/COLOR][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B]', '[B][LOWERCASE][CAPITALIZE][COLOR aquamarine]server 10[/COLOR][/CAPITALIZE][/LOWERCASE][/B]']) lists = ['$doregex[F4mProxytengo2]','$doregex[F4mProxytengo2]','$doregex[F4mProxytengo2]','$doregex[F4mProxytengo2]','$doregex[F4mProxytengo2]','$doregex[F4mProxytengo2]','$doregex[F4mProxytengo2]','$doregex[F4mProxytengo2]','$doregex[F4mProxytengo2]','$doregex[F4mProxytengo2]'] return lists[ret] ea-ya-la-tienes-arreglaita #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re, requests url = 'https://dailysport.pw/'+'[yaestaarreglada.param3]' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:73.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/73.0', 'Referer': 'https://dailysport.pw'} marcador = requests.get(url, headers=headers, verify=False) r = marcador.text return re.findall('window.atob."(.*?)"', r)[0] get-decode $pyFunction:base64.b64decode("$doregex[ea-ya-la-tienes-arreglaita]") https://i.imgur.com/Vq1pYBs.jpg https://i.imgur.com/py1aH72.jpg
